page.title: 18Farm Through a Child's Eyes
page.content: I like living on a farm because there's lots to do. I enjoy helping my Dad on the farm, particularly driving the tractor with the tillaerator on the back. This winter was the worst for 20 years. The snow was over a foot deep & it was great because the school bus couldn't get through & we stayed at home. The river was shallow & frozen, we pushed each other along it on sledges and then played snowballs. We got very cold and wet and Mum gave us steaming hot mugs of soup in front of the fire when we got home. {An August Day} I got up and walked my dog on the Minnis. After breakfast I played space games on my computer. I met my friend and played soldiers. After lunch I rode my bike to the BMX track & tried some jumps. In the evening I watched TV, read a book and went to bed.
